Reviews.Title: Worth the price
Reviews.Author: Alice Hooser
Reviews.Content: I liked that it came as a package deal. The price I paid for everything was what the camera was going for at box stores.

Reviews.Title: Item delivered not as presented in ad
Reviews.Author: roxy7070
Reviews.Content: Delivery was excellant. This camera was a gift. When opened, it was just the camera. No 8GB card, no case and no acessory kit. Amazon will not ship the missing items. I have to send it all back for a refund and reorder the same bundle with the faith that it will come in as ordered

ProductInfo.Features:
7x wide-angle NIKKOR glass lens
720p HD video recording
Vibration Reduction helps keep shots steady
20.1-megapixel CCD image sensor
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX 26379 26379-NIKON S3500 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Red) Bundle with 8GB SD Memory Card + Camera Case and Accessory Kit
